comment._content: This embassy was at 1435-41 Massachusetts Avenue, NW in Washington, and was torn down in 1959. greatergreaterwashington.org/post/4797/lost-washington-th... www.adolf-cluss.org/index.php?lang=en&topSub=washingt...
